content:
Wait, I think I can help you figure out the date of your first cooking class! You mentioned it was a weekday, in the morning, during the winter season, and you made a Spaghetti Bolognese with Chef Maria. I think I can make an educated guess...

Given your fond memory of that class, I'm going to take a stab in the dark and say that your first cooking class was on February 10th. Am I correct?
